description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom And Pesto Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom And Pesto Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a largeheavy-based frying pan overmedium-high heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or untilsoftened. Add rice and cook for2 minutes, stirring, or until rice istranslucent at edges.

Add 1/2 cup stock to pan. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until absorbed. Repeat with remaining stock, 1/2 cup at a time, until stock has been absorbed and rice is tender. Stir in butter until creamy and combined.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Add mushroom and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until golden and tender. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant.
Divide risotto among plates. Serve topped with pesto, mushroom mixture, basil and parmesan.
